content.rendered:
Our projects over the past two weeks are all wrapped up.

The ribbon cutting at Burry Bookstore in Harstville, SC:

 

 

 

 

 

 

The completion of the Walls of Books in Athens:

 

 

 

 

 

And the colorful book fair at Northside Elementary:

 

 

 

 

 

Wandering the Stacks at Gottwals Books

We were recently featured in an article, Wandering the Stacks at Gottwals Books. Those looking for Georgia Real Estate should check out what they have to offer for Byron, GA Real Estate.

excerpt.rendered: Our projects over the past two weeks are all wrapped up!
